name: George Spence
summary: George Spence - Data Engineer @ Hexegic | MChem(Hons)

experiences: In the first 6 months, saved over 30 FTEs for the customer by automating repetitive dataset ingestion processes and producing front-end dashboards to support operational analysis and planning, leading to my promotion to deputy team lead.
Responsible for managing the technical business of the team, mentoring other team members and approving peer reviews.
Features deployed include: optimised data pipelines using PySpark and Pandas, complex relational ontologies to represent real world data models and responsive front-end applications using TypeScript.
Developed a data uploader library for processing multiple file types with varying schemas by implementing upload config versioning and custom data health checks.

work_experience.company: Defence Science and Technology Laboratories - MOD
Defence Science and Technology Laboratories - MOD

education.masters_project: Synthesis of a water-soluble copper(II) complex to detect reactive nitrogen species.
